name: Let The Gun Dance!
description:
Cover Art By: SafAnimate
"the worst best shooter game"
A rage/arcade game where you control a gun that moves on its and is hard to control 

shoot enemies, and when too many enemies get to you, you can use your BIG SHOT.

Your BIG SHOT shoots a bullet 10x bigger than normal bullets. 
You can also boost 5x your speed. 
And Use OP Powerups
See how many points you manage you get.
